title: EOL and EOS Information
description: A draft schema for representing End-of-Life (EOL) and End-of-Support (EOS) information in OpenEoX.

statements.description: Contains a list of statement elements.

items.description: Contains a list of statement elements.

Schema_shell.title: Schema shell
Schema_shell.description: Specifies the schema the JSON object must be valid against.

Statement.title: Statement
Statement.description: Statements contain the single OpenEoX entries.

ProductName_t.title: ProductName t
ProductName_t.description: Contains the name of the product.

ProductVersion_t.title: ProductVersion t
ProductVersion_t.description: Contains the version or release of the product.

SupplierName_t.title: SupplierName t
SupplierName_t.description: Contains the name of the supplier or service provider.
